data.description:
Armed with a battery hungry flashlight, you find yourself exploring what appears to be a quiet average looking home in a woodsy neighborhood. Before long, you discover you’re not alone as you discover the clues unraveling the horrifying mystery of what’s gone on in this house and struggle to survive the terror that hunts you.

For an even more terrifying experience, switch to the highly popular VR Mode which immerses you in the environment using minimum Room Scale combined with our Immersive Movement Role-play System (IMRS). After the tutorial, you're on your own. Zero onscreen directions or HUD in your face, you’re never taken out of the immersion.

changelog.change_log:
PATCH NOTES: Version: 1.2

1) Improvements were made to the save file system to prevent the player from getting stuck at any checkpoint when loading a previous save. 

2) Fixes were implemented to the flashlight section of the tutorial to insure that the player is able to compete the game-play tutorial. 

3) Improvements were made to the level transition sections of the game to prevent the player from being teleported out of the playable area. 

4) Various improvements were made to guardian system's respawn function to prevent the player from getting stuck in spawn locations. 

5) Improvements were made to play room closet event to prevent the player from triggering it too early.  

6) Improvements made to the guardian system to prevent the player from leaving the playable area. 

Thank you for your continued support of our game we greatly appreciate you all.

We have fixed a bug that prevented multiple control schemes from appearing in the control settings in the main menu.  You can now adjust your control scheme to SMOOTH TURN + STRAFE as well as additional Snap Turn options.  We have also fixed a few graphical errors.
